answers.answer: Your post is difficult to comprehend. Please explain what you mean by "replaced".
Every cell in our body will die and body creates new cell. Likewise cells in pancreas will be replaced. After some months the complete cells in pancreas will be replaced. Is my understanding correct?
Can you provide an answer to the above question?

question: Since pancreas produces less insulin, persons get diabetes. At the same time every organ in our body gets replaced after some time. If this is the case, pancreas will be replaced after some time. Then why the replaced pancreas will not produce enough insulin? Is the problem with pancreas or something else?
title: Pancreas produces insulin
